title: it's kind of sad how people often don't give a shit about bees
body:
even after the issue of genetically modified crops killing bees and many other things killing bees has been spread by wildfire

many people still don't give a shit

it's kind of sad to me because of how what they provide for us is right in front of everyone yet many don't seem to actually take it into deep thought of how the world would be without bees

like the amount of food we wouldn't have

it would not be fun at all

actually very bad for us

but does that actually appear to people?

it doesn't seem so for many

i guess it could be that people need something to happen for them to wake up

like it has to be a reality, not a possible scenario
